values.name: READ_JSON
values.comment: Read JSON straight to columnar data

values.name: VALUES
values.comment: Any other JSON type, e.g., ARRAY

values.name: UNSTRUCTURED
values.comment: One unit after another, newlines can be anywhere

values.name: NEWLINE_DELIMITED
values.comment: Units are separated by newlines, newlines do not occur within Units (NDJSON)

values.name: ARRAY
values.comment: File is one big array of units
